name: In re Nomination Papers of Charles A. McGEORGE as Candidate for the Office of Delegate to the Republican National Convention. Appeal of John F. McNichol
name_abbreviation: In re Nomination Papers of McGeorge

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: In re Nomination Papers of Charles A. McGEORGE as Candidate for the Office of Delegate to the Republican National Convention. Appeal of John F. McNichol.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 15th day of March, 2000, the order of commonwealth court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Francis X. Crowley, Media, for John F. McNichol.
Jean B. Green, Norristown, Patricia Sons Biswanger, Philadelphia, for Charles A. McGeorge.
casebody.head_matter:
747 A.2d 358
In re Nomination Papers of Charles A. McGEORGE as Candidate for the Office of Delegate to the Republican National Convention. Appeal of John F. McNichol.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted March 3, 2000.
Decided March 15, 2000.
Francis X. Crowley, Media, for John F. McNichol.
Jean B. Green, Norristown, Patricia Sons Biswanger, Philadelphia, for Charles A. McGeorge.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
